title: Poster, 1968–70
medium: Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on linen
markings: printed in black ink, at bottom left: TOWA (in red diamond)
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1968–70.
1968–70. Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on linen. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-129.
